place:
PREFIX am: <http://www.wisski.uni-bayreuth.de/ontologies/africamultiple/240307/>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/240307/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?id WHERE {{
    ?id rdf:type am:subregion .
    ?id ecrm:P1_is_identified_by ?labelEntity .
    ?labelEntity rdf:type ecrm:E41_Appellation .
    ?labelEntity ecrm:P3_has_note "{level_0}"@en .
    ?id ecrm:P89_falls_within ?broaderClass .
    ?labelbroaderClass rdf:type am:country .
    ?broaderClass ecrm:P1_is_identified_by ?labelbroaderClass .
    ?labelbroaderClass rdf:type ecrm:E41_Appellation .
    ?labelbroaderClass ecrm:P3_has_note "{level_1}"@en
}}
region:
PREFIX am: <http://www.wisski.uni-bayreuth.de/ontologies/africamultiple/240307/>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/240307/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?id WHERE {{
    ?id rdf:type am:region .
    ?id ecrm:P1_is_identified_by ?labelEntity .
    ?labelEntity rdf:type ecrm:E41_Appellation .
    ?labelEntity ecrm:P3_has_note "{level_0}"@en .
    ?id ecrm:P89_falls_within ?broaderClass .
    ?broaderClass ecrm:P1_is_identified_by ?labelbroaderClass .
    ?labelbroaderClass rdf:type ecrm:E41_Appellation .
    ?labelbroaderClass ecrm:P3_has_note "{level_1}"@en
}}
subregion:
PREFIX am: <http://www.wisski.uni-bayreuth.de/ontologies/africamultiple/240307/>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/240307/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?id WHERE {{
    ?id rdf:type am:subregion .
    ?id ecrm:P1_is_identified_by ?labelEntity .
    ?labelEntity rdf:type ecrm:E41_Appellation .
    ?labelEntity ecrm:P3_has_note "{level_0}"@en .
    ?id ecrm:P89_falls_within ?broaderClass .
    ?broaderClass ecrm:P1_is_identified_by ?labelbroaderClass .
    ?labelbroaderClass rdf:type ecrm:E41_Appellation .
    ?labelbroaderClass ecrm:P3_has_note "{level_1}"@en
}}
personlist:
PREFIX am: <http://www.wisski.uni-bayreuth.de/ontologies/africamultiple/240307/>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/240307/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?labelValue WHERE {
    ?id rdf:type ecrm:E21_Person .
    ?id ecrm:P1_is_identified_by ?labelEntity .
    ?labelEntity rdf:type ecrm:E41_Appellation .
    ?labelEntity am:person_name ?labelValue .
}
institutionlist:
PREFIX am: <http://www.wisski.uni-bayreuth.de/ontologies/africamultiple/240307/>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/240307/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?labelValue WHERE {
    ?id rdf:type am:institution .
    ?id ecrm:P1_is_identified_by ?labelEntity .
    ?labelEntity rdf:type ecrm:E41_Appellation .
    ?labelEntity ecrm:P3_has_note ?labelValue .
}
